ns2:member.name: measurement-job
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Measurement Job. This job monitors a number of Measurement Types and the resulting data will be presented in an XML file. This file will then be available for collection.

ns2:member.name: none
ns2:member.ns2:desc: MUST not be used. The job-type 'none' is present only for internal reasons.

ns2:member.name: realtime-job
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Real-time Job. This job monitors one or more Measurement Types and makes the current value available in the model to be fetched by the MS.

ns2:member.name: threshold-job
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Threshold Job. This job monitors one or more Measurement Types against assigned thresholds. If a threshold is exceeded an alarm will be issued.
